pages.text: Water release is a nature release, this means the player can start with it (at which point it will have reduced jutsu xp costs) or unlock it via obtaining a water jutsu from a scroll

pages.title: Hiding in mist
pages.text: Upon use of this jutsu the user will summon fog around them making the player hard to see. all mobs inside will be given glowing.($li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:100$(li)Jutsuxp needed: 200
